title.rendered: Khloe and Kim Kardashian: Krazy for Publicity

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Is there a photo opportunity Khloe and Kim Kardashian can ever turn down?

The publicity-krazed sisters showed up at the 40th anniversary of the Big Mac over the weekend. We have no idea why. But we do know that Kim may have set a new fashion low for herself…

Kim and Khloe Kardashian are not karb kounting.
